item.title: NFL Running Back Analysis
item.description: The NFL is a gold mine for interesting statistics such as the average number of passing yards per quarterback, the average number of yards gained by running back, and the number of receiving yards per top receivers. In this post we conduct some exploratory analysis on the top running backs in the NFL to determine what made these running backs so successful in 2018.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
